content:
Hi!
I'm wondering how to invite new users to this community. I sent my friend (an algebraic topology grad student at UCLA) the invite link from Thursday's email, but it didn't work for him: he got an "expired invite" error

I don't think there should be any problem if someone goes here:

https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/join/6ueg2s9jv6o07eoqzwfdh79f/
If you go to "invite users" in the gear menu there's a button to generate an invite link. Not sure if anyone can do that or only admins

@Jules Hedges
thanks! This worked!
